snippet.title: Gust of Wind Playable Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Step in the three-toed shoes of a mutant gull stealth expert in a detailed sandbox mission with a lot of climbable elements and freedom of movement.

Download the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1715390/Gust_of_Wind/

The story of Gust of Wind is set in a world where mutant seagulls are scavenging for equipment that will help their home town endure in the constant war against rival factions. The main character is part of a crew of warriors sent overseas to scavenge technology detrimental to the survival of their home town.
